chara.textHome:
I sensed something strange when
I first arrived in Kamihama.

It seemed no different than where I live,
Mitakihara, but the constant charge of
magic in the air was completely different.

That was the only time I ever felt
anything like that...
My favorite kind of magic...
I think it has to be the magic of brewing tea.

I'm always so delighted to take a sip
after finishing a battle.

I feel like I just overcame a hurdle.
But I can go even further than this!

I see it now...
The scope of my heart has grown more vast...

I didn't have the luxury of wishing for
anything other than my own life back
when I became a Magical Girl.

If I had another chance,
I wonder what I would've wished for?
Back in the old days, I fought by myself.

I couldn't open up to anyone as a
Magical Girl about my worries, my fears...
I was completely alone.
But then I made friends...
They are the reason I can keep going.
I am certain of it.
I knew we'd meet again. *Giggle*
I had a feeling I'd see you soon.
I'm glad I was right.

I think the best teas to have in the morning
are English Breakfast and Nilgiri.
I'm boiling some water now.
Would you like a cup?

It's nice to eat lunch outside
when the weather is pleasant.

Sitting on a bench
while enjoying the breeze...

I wonder what kind of tea would
best fit the atmosphereâ€¦
Afternoon tea...
It's a bit late to say that...

But sipping some tea while watching
the sunset is surprisingly nice.
Hm, it's this late already?

Time really flies when you're
chatting with friends.

Staying up late is bad for your beauty 
and health, so let's go to sleep soon.

When you live alone, it's easy to waste
a whole day doing nothing at all...
You need to be careful.

It's important to make the
most of one's time, after all.

There are so many things I don't know 
about Magical Girls... About myself.
What is the meaning of our existence?

Yeah, that's not a bad idea.
 I'll be able to try out some new strategies.
But I won't go easy on you, so be prepared.

You can learn new magic
through training long hours.

I've learned quite a bit of new magic
that way myself.
It just takes time.
I found a really nice cake shop the other day!
Everything was delicious and looked so cute!
Want to go sometime?
I like herbal tea.
I find it very relaxing to drink chamomile...

Oh that reminds me, I need to buy 
some more soon.

Even if you're weak,
when many come together their
combined might can be truly great.
The same can be said about my guns.

Yes, I buy the sweets I have with
my tea at my favorite cake shop.
But I cook all my other meals myself.

Obviously I like the taste of tea,
but I also enjoy the smell of it.

Don't you think Earl Grey tea
has a relaxing aroma?
I like to relax in a nice, warm bath.

I clear my thoughts, close my eyes,
and lean back in the water.
It helps me forget about fighting Witches.

Each Magical Girl has her own outfit,
but I particularly like mine.

The colors are somewhat subdued,
so it feels perfect for me.

I'm thinking of calling the five of us from
Mitakihara the "Puella Magi Holy Quintet"!
What do you think?
Fear not. There's no way I'll lose.
One job done.
Phew... That was close!
All right then. Time for some tea.
Want to come to my place after this?

My name is Mami Tomoe.
I go to school in Mitakihara.

I'm also a Magical Girl who
made a contract with Kyubey.
It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
Let's get going!

That feels wonderful...
I can tell my magic is getting stronger.

My body feels so light...
Yes, there's no doubt at all!
I'm in peak condition!

Can my magic improve beyond even
this stage, I wonder?
I would like to test that.

The wish I made to become a Magical Girl
allowed me to cheat death.

It's that very wish that forms
the basis of the magic I use.

I have become adept at handling many
different kinds of magic with various effects,
but naturally I still have much to learn.
I must keep studying!
